attributes.action: Provide funding to save the Bristol Wildwalk and Imax Theatre from closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bristol Wildwalk and Imax Theatre are facing closure because of a lack of funding. These are the only facilities in the West of England and encourage children to take an interest in ecology, environmental and technological issues. England does not seem to provide funding for such attractions, but Wales and Scotland do. How can you get children interested in science and technology if they can't experience it?
